extendedInfo.description: Discover the new generation of advent calendars!This innovative App connects the traditional advent calendar with the virtual world. So you can not only enjoy a piece of delicious Windel chocolate everyday, but also a fancy Santa animation on your Android smartphone and tablet.Behind each of the 24 doors thereâs a picture (marker) which can be read using this App. Each marker shows a different animation. And with a bit of entertainment the time until Christmas flies. By the way, behind all this is the technic of augmented reality.How it works: Open a calendar door every day, tear it off along the perforation and place it on a bright background. Make sure using the App with good lighting conditions. The App starts the camera of your device. Focus it with a distance of 20 cm on the marker and the Windel Santa will show up. Sometimes funny, sometimes clumsy, sometimes sporty. Get a little taste! Download the first marker here, print it and try it with this App.http://dl.die-etagen.de/Kundenupload/Windel/Windel_Marker_01.zipTo see all 24 animations you have to buy the Windel APP calendar. It is available in shops during the Christmas season 2012. For more information visitwww.die-etagen.de/windel-adventskalenderEnjoy and have a merry Christmas!Your Windel Christmas Team

reviews.title: For the people who can\'t read instructions
reviews.comment: You have to purchase the actual advent calendar that\'s for sale in the shops, then scan the symbol on the rear of the door that you have torn off for the Santa to work. If I can find one I will give it a go.
reviews.author: Adrian Lockhart

reviews.title: Julie S
reviews.comment: This is really clever.  Downloaded the marker & printed it off.  Struggled to get it to work on my hand, worked best on a white background.  They also had a picture demo on their website site so printed that & cut the marker out that was on her hand.  It worked & more interesting than the demo marker on android!
reviews.author: Julie Steadman

reviews.title: the next generation, still a bit rough round the edges
reviews.comment: Very snappy on my iPhone, noticably slower on my Android, both using same wi-fi. None-the-less, a good first attempt at a calander app. I\'ll also buy it next year. My children thought it was \"cool\".
reviews.author: Alexander Beck

reviews.title: A little crap
reviews.comment: All it did was open the camera on my phone and I touched the screen and it did not take pics or any thing so, a little crap. It might work on Christmas, though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: rubbish
reviews.comment: all it did was open my camera on phone and thats it could take pics or anything totally rubbish
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ho ho ho
reviews.comment: Something new, something different and so cute....love it :-)
reviews.author: Ornella Muscardin
